stages.logText: I must stop Ewmondold from getting stronger.
A traveler named Ewmondold had asked me to venture into the Snake Cave to retrieve his map.
Ewmondold had thanked me for killing the Snake master, and that his way to rule would be free. I should find him.
I've destroyed Ewmondold and eliminated his threat to Crossglen and the surrounding area.
I've returned Ewmondold's map to him.
I agreed to help Seviron trap the mouse that the cat cannot catch. I need to get some cheese, a large empty bottle, and three rocks.
I have given Seviron the rocks.
I have given Seviron the cheese.
I obtained a suitable bottle from Arlish.
I have given Seviron the bottle. Seviron will set the trap, but it may take some time to catch the mouse. I should come back later.
The mouse has been caught! Seviron gave it to me in the bottle. He said I can decide what to do with it.
I decided to give the mouse to the cat. The cat would have eventually killed it anyway.
I decided to release the mouse outside. Seviron told me to do that outside the town.
